Message: Hi, I’m the NewsBreak Ad Assistant. How can I help?
The user completes the submission of the form
Hi! How can I provide access to the advertising account?

Hey there! To grant access to your advertising account, follow these steps:

1. Go to Account Management.
2. Switch over to the 'Ad Accounts' tab.
3. Click ‘Access’ under your preferred Ad account.
4. Select ‘Add User’ on the right-hand side of your screen.
5. Fill in the email address of the new user and their Ad account role (Admin, Operator, or Viewer) and submit.

Once submitted, the new user will receive an email prompt to follow a link for verification. After verifying their email, they will see your Ad account listed under their own Account Management tab.

For more details, you can check out this guide: [Account Management Guide](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/17539290349709-Account-Management-Guide).
